languages.text: {n}Наконец, женщина устало вздыхает, бережно раправляет грамоту меж ладоней и укладывает ее в специальный контейнер для хранения с кодовым замком.{/n} "Обо всем об этом я предпочту подумать в одиночестве, шерин. Спасибо, что не оставили меня даже в подобной ситуации. Будь я на вашем месте... не уверена, оставила бы я себя".

traits.locale_text: {n}Наконец, женщина устало вздыхает, бережно раправляет грамоту меж ладоней и укладывает ее в специальный контейнер для хранения с кодовым замком.{/n} "Обо всем об этом я предпочту подумать в одиночестве, шерин. Спасибо, что не оставили меня даже в подобной ситуации. Будь я на вашем месте... не уверена, оставила бы я себя".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Finally, she sighs wearily, carefully straightens the certificate between her hands and places it in a special container with a code lock.{/n} I would like to reflect on all this in privacy, shereen. Thank you for not leaving me in that situation. If I had been in your place... I don't know if I would have left you."
languages.original_text: {n}Наконец, женщина устало вздыхает, бережно раправляет грамоту меж ладоней и укладывает ее в специальный контейнер для хранения с кодовым замком.{/n} "Обо всем об этом я предпочту подумать в одиночестве, шерин. Спасибо, что не оставили меня даже в подобной ситуации. Будь я на вашем месте... не уверена, оставила бы я себя".

Thank you for not leaving me in that situation. If I had been in your place... I don't know if I would have left you."

Thank you for not leaving me in that situation. If I had been in your place... I don't know if I would have left you."

Thank you for not leaving me in that situation. If I had been in your place... I don't know if I would have left you."

Thank you for not leaving me in that situation. If I had been in your place... I don't know if I would have left you."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Finally, she sighs wearily, carefully straightens the certificate between her hands and places it in a special container with a code lock.{/n} I would like to reflect on all this in privacy, shereen. Thank you for not leaving me in that situation. If I had been in your place... I don't know if I would have left you."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}最後に疲れたようにため息をつくと、彼女は証明書を両手で慎重に平らにし、コードロックが付いた特別な入れ物に入れた。{/n}「起きたことのすべてについて、一人で考えたいと思っているの、シャリーン。あんな状況に置き去りにしないでくれたこと、感謝するわ。もしあたしがあんたの立場だったら…あんたを置き去りにしたかもしれない」
languages.original_text: {n}Finally, she sighs wearily, carefully straightens the certificate between her hands and places it in a special container with a code lock.{/n} I would like to reflect on all this in privacy, shereen. Thank you for not leaving me in that situation. If I had been in your place... I don't know if I would have left you."

traits.locale_text: {n}最後に疲れたようにため息をつくと、彼女は証明書を両手で慎重に平らにし、コードロックが付いた特別な入れ物に入れた。{/n}「起きたことのすべてについて、一人で考えたいと思っているの、シャリーン。あんな状況に置き去りにしないでくれたこと、感謝するわ。もしあたしがあんたの立場だったら…あんたを置き去りにしたかもしれない」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}到最后，婕伊疲惫地叹了口气，小心翼翼地收起了手中的执照，把它放在带有密码锁的特制容器中。{/n}“我希望能私下里和你好好谈谈这件事情，亲爱的。谢谢你，没有在那样的情况下抛弃我。如果换做是我……我恐怕说不好会不会抛弃你。”
languages.original_text: {n}Finally, she sighs wearily, carefully straightens the certificate between her hands and places it in a special container with a code lock.{/n} I would like to reflect on all this in privacy, shereen. Thank you for not leaving me in that situation. If I had been in your place... I don't know if I would have left you."

traits.locale_text: {n}到最后，婕伊疲惫地叹了口气，小心翼翼地收起了手中的执照，把它放在带有密码锁的特制容器中。{/n}“我希望能私下里和你好好谈谈这件事情，亲爱的。谢谢你，没有在那样的情况下抛弃我。如果换做是我……我恐怕说不好会不会抛弃你。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Finalmente, suspira cansada, aplana con cuidado el certificado entre sus manos y lo deposita en un contenedor especial con un código de cierre.{/n} «Quiero digerir todo esto en privado, shereen. Gracias por no abandonarme en aquella situación. De haber estado en su lugar... no sé si lo habría hecho».
languages.original_text: {n}Finally, she sighs wearily, carefully straightens the certificate between her hands and places it in a special container with a code lock.{/n} I would like to reflect on all this in privacy, shereen. Thank you for not leaving me in that situation. If I had been in your place... I don't know if I would have left you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Finalmente, suspira cansada, aplana con cuidado el certificado entre sus manos y lo deposita en un contenedor especial con un código de cierre.{/n} «Quiero digerir todo esto en privado, shereen. Gracias por no abandonarme en aquella situación. De haber estado en su lugar... no sé si lo habría hecho».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Elle finit par pousser un soupir las et lisse soigneusement le certificat qu'elle tient entre les mains avant de le ranger dans un conteneur verrouillé par un code.{/n} « J'ai besoin d'un peu de temps pour réfléchir, shereen. Merci de ne pas m'avoir laissée seule dans cette situation. Si j'avais été à votre place... Je ne sais pas ce que j'aurais fait. »
languages.original_text: {n}Finally, she sighs wearily, carefully straightens the certificate between her hands and places it in a special container with a code lock.{/n} I would like to reflect on all this in privacy, shereen. Thank you for not leaving me in that situation. If I had been in your place... I don't know if I would have left you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Elle finit par pousser un soupir las et lisse soigneusement le certificat qu'elle tient entre les mains avant de le ranger dans un conteneur verrouillé par un code.{/n} « J'ai besoin d'un peu de temps pour réfléchir, shereen. Merci de ne pas m'avoir laissée seule dans cette situation. Si j'avais été à votre place... Je ne sais pas ce que j'aurais fait. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Schließlich seufzt sie kraftlos, streicht sorgsam das Zertifikat in ihren Händen glatt und legt es in einen besonderen Behälter mit Codeschloss.{/n} "Ich möchte über all das in Ruhe nachdenken, Shereen. Danke, dass Ihr mich nicht im Stich gelassen habt. Wäre ich an Eurer Stelle gewesen ... ich weiß nicht, ob ich Euch verlassen hätte."
languages.original_text: {n}Finally, she sighs wearily, carefully straightens the certificate between her hands and places it in a special container with a code lock.{/n} I would like to reflect on all this in privacy, shereen. Thank you for not leaving me in that situation. If I had been in your place... I don't know if I would have left you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Schließlich seufzt sie kraftlos, streicht sorgsam das Zertifikat in ihren Händen glatt und legt es in einen besonderen Behälter mit Codeschloss.{/n} "Ich möchte über all das in Ruhe nachdenken, Shereen. Danke, dass Ihr mich nicht im Stich gelassen habt. Wäre ich an Eurer Stelle gewesen ... ich weiß nicht, ob ich Euch verlassen hätte."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Nihayet yorgunca iç çekip tasdiknameyi elleriyle dikkatlice düzeltiyor ve kod kilitli, özel bir kutuya yerleştiriyor.{/n} Yalnız kalıp olanları sindirmek isterim şirinim. Beni o hâlde bırakmadığın için teşekkür ederim. Senin yerinde ben olsam... Bırakır mıydım bilmiyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Finally, she sighs wearily, carefully straightens the certificate between her hands and places it in a special container with a code lock.{/n} I would like to reflect on all this in privacy, shereen. Thank you for not leaving me in that situation. If I had been in your place... I don't know if I would have left you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nihayet yorgunca iç çekip tasdiknameyi elleriyle, dikkatlice düzeltiyor ve kod kilitli, özel bir kutuya yerleştiriyor.{/n} Yalnız kalıp olanları sindirmek isterim şirinim. Beni o hâlde bırakmadığın için teşekkür ederim. Senin yerinde ben olsam... Bırakır mıydım, bilmiyorum."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
